comments.creator: hzbz@pm.me
comments.text:
I tried to drag the air.mozilla.com tab to detach it, and both tries caused a new window to open with a blank tab.

While in the middle of one of the drags, the insertion marker (see screenshot) appeared and stuck there. Dragging the tab again over the bar, and dragging off, caused the marker to disappear again.
comments.raw_text:
I tried to drag the air.mozilla.com tab to detach it, and both tries caused a new window to open with a blank tab.

While in the middle of one of the drags, the insertion marker (see screenshot) appeared and stuck there. Dragging the tab again over the bar, and dragging off, caused the marker to disappear again.
comments.author: hzbz@pm.me

comments.text: Hrm, this does not occur in a new profile. Maybe an add-on...
comments.raw_text: Hrm, this does not occur in a new profile. Maybe an add-on...
